subject: My Dear
body:
My Dear
How are you today? I got your mail in respect of your payment, let me
give you more details about the source of the funds and myself . Iâ€™m
Rev Timothy Johnson, director of the Cash Processing unit. I was
delegated by IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) International Monetary
together with World Bank Financial Support to compensate you with the
sum of $1.5M US from the Reserve Account (RA) as Relief Fund to
alleviate poverty caused by Covid-19 pandemic.We were on round table
 Therefore you will receive the sum of $1,495.000. I want you to
handle this transaction with care considering how much is involved. I
want you to carefully fill required information as listed below to
avoid paying to the wrong person.
As soon as you confirm the accuracy of information, we will comply
with more information to enable you to receive your fund within three
days.
Full name:
Address:
Phone #
Occupation :
We have made all the necessary arrangements to complete your delivery
within 3 official working days, therefore, you should check your email
from time to time to reply at the right time to enable us to meet with
the three days delivery time frame. forward all details to my private 
email.timothyjohnsonrv@gmail.com
We wait to hear from you shortly
Rev.Timothy Johnson
Cash Processing Unit

subject: Re:    My Dear
body:
Hello Reverend Timothy Johnson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am quite intrigued by your email and the opportunity it presents. It's not every day that one receives such news.

However, I would like to understand more about this process. Could you please elaborate on the source of these funds? And how was I chosen for this compensation?

Also, could you provide more details about the Cash Processing Unit and its operations? How does it work with IMF World Economic Outlook WEO Monetary and World Bank Financial Support?

Lastly, you mentioned a 'Reserve Account RA'. Could you explain what that is?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Your case is already in our system , I think one of the staff is on the
matter, comply to the directive so that you will receive your money .

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's good to hear that my case is already in your system and being handled by one of your staff members. Could you please provide me with more details about the directive I need to comply with? Also, could you tell me when I can expect to receive the money?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
